Name: Swipe
Text: This attack targets all adjacent characters.

Name: Chomp
Text: Rancor defeats a character it is holding.

Name: Grab
Text: Rancor grabs hold of an adjacent character. If it is already holding one, put that one down on the nearest empty tile.

Name: Stomp
Text: Turn characters adjacent to Rancor on their side. They cannot move, attack, or defend until any player discards 3 cards to stand it back up.

Name: Charge
Text: Reek moves until it hits a wall. Turn characters along the path on their side. They cannot move, attack, or defend until any player discards 3 cards to stand it back up
